arguments.template: Drag
{{onLabelMessage}} {{offLabelMessage}}

<input type="text"
            #input
            autocomplete="off"
            autocorrect="off"
            autocapitalize="off"
            spellcheck="false"
            class="k-textbox"
            [id]="focusableId"
            [tabindex]="tabIndex"
            [attr.title]="title"
            [disabled]="disabled"
            [readonly]="readonly"
            (focus)="handleFocus($event)"
            (blur)="handleBlur($event)"
            (dragstart)="handleDragDrop()"
            (drop)="handleDragDrop()"
        />
